items.name: Circle of Guilt
enchantMods: Your Meteor Towers create Burning Ground for 3 seconds on Hit
implicitMods: You and your Minions take 13% reduced Reflected Damage
explicitMods: +17 to all Attributes
Adds 10 to 15 Physical Damage
+395 to Armour
Herald of Purity has 60% increased Buff Effect
60% increased Physical Damage while affected by Herald of Purity
flavourText: I feel the moral weight of what I must do to protect Wraeclast.
I accept my guilt without shame. It is my gift to humanity.

items.name: Circle of Guilt
enchantMods: Your Chilling Towers freeze enemies for 0.2 seconds while they are affected by chilling beams
explicitMods: +14 to all Attributes
Adds 9 to 16 Physical Damage
+358 to Armour
Herald of Purity has 59% increased Buff Effect
70% increased Physical Damage while affected by Herald of Purity
flavourText: I feel the moral weight of what I must do to protect Wraeclast.
I accept my guilt without shame. It is my gift to humanity.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Corrupting Fever Gems
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
15% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 15% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."

items.name: Asenath's Gentle Touch
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Vulnerability on Hit
explicitMods: +24 to Intelligence
+74 to maximum Life
+67 to maximum Mana
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains on Hit
Non-Aura Curses you inflict are not removed from Dying Enemies

Enemies near corpses affected by your Curses are Blinded
Enemies Killed near corpses affected by your Curses explode, dealing
3% of their Life as Physical Damage
flavourText: Cool the head and cool the blade.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that causes nearby enemies to take more physical damage.
explicitMods: +1 metre to radius
40% increased Area of Effect

Nearby Enemies take at least 20% more Physical Damage,
 raising up to 40% as they stay in the Aura for 4 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Base duration is 7.00 seconds
Grants 5% increased Attack Speed
1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Startled Divine Life Flask of Allaying
explicitMods: 28% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 12 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 12 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
